description.desc3: This node should only be used for debugging purposes. It is very resource hungry and can affect the performance of your patch

Name.descript: give it a more meaning full name.

Notes.note1: It is really very resource hungry. For a more permament texture inspection your are adviced to use a Window-ViewPort - pair.

Feedback.feedback1: Documentations take a lot of time and effort. Unfortunately both are scarce ressources.
Feedback.feedback2: If you would like to have more info about this node please drop a note. It helps to set priorities according to the user needs...
